messages.subject: Understanding unschooling life
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/7/03 4:54:01 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/7/03 4:54:01 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< She's some kind of little beauty queen. It's very foreign to us. >>

She'd fit in SO very well here!! I was doing a makeover for a friend
yesterday that was having some skin problems. We did a facial and while I was
doing the make up, Sierra and her new neighborhood girlfriend from three
doors down were watching.
Shay kept saying (imagine wide eyed six y.o. here) "my Mom has GOT to meet
you" as she shakes her head in awe. It was all I could do to not laugh, she
was so cute.
Apparently her Mum loves makeup too. Shay and Sierra gave each other make
overs with the makeup they got for Christmas. They are six and five years
old, respectively.


Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
